author: undetermined
full_text:
Australia & Afghanistan Net Sessions - ICC Men's Cricket World Cup India 2023

Location: Mumbai, India
Date: November 06, 2023
Photographer: Robert Cianflone

Image Description:
Former Indian cricketer Sachin Tendulkar speaks to members of the Afghanistan cricket team prior to the Afghanistan training session at Wankhede Stadium.

Image Details:
- Taken at Wankhede Stadium
- Part of ICC Cricket World Cup 2023
- Features Sachin Tendulkar interacting with Afghanistan cricket team members
- Editorial image, not commercially released
- Collection: Getty Images Sport

Keywords:
Sachin Tendulkar, Afghanistan, Cricket Player, Cricket Team, Former, Four People, ICC Cricket World Cup, India, Maharashtra, Mumbai, One Day Cricket, One-Day Event, People, Sport, Sports Training, Talking, Three Quarter Length, Wankhede Stadium

Rights and Usage:
- No commercial uses without permission
- Rights-managed image
- Contact local Getty Images office for usage rights
title: Fact:  The viral image was found to be photoshopped. Two different images were clubbed together to make it look like Maxwell touched Sachin’s feet.
vclaim: Former Indian cricketer Sachin Tendulkar met with and spoke to members of the Afghanistan cricket team during their training session at Wankhede Stadium for the 2023 ICC Men's Cricket World Cup in Mumbai.
